list.title: Memories of KSRI
list.photo: [{"photo": "1.jpg", "title": "Inaugration of the KSRInstitute by S.V.Ramamurthi I.C.S. on 22nd April 1945. L.to R.: K.M.Munshi, Sir.S.V.Ramamurthi, Rt.Hon'ble V.S. Srinivasa Sastri & Dr. S. Radhakrishnan"}, {"photo": "2.JPG", "title": "H.E. Bishnuram Madhi, Governor of Madras, addressing the Institute's 14th Foundation Day 28 Septemper 1958"}, {"photo": "3.jpg", "title": "H.H. Institute and other Sanskrit Institutions. 22nd November 1960"}, {"photo": "5.jpg", "title": "17th Foundation Day, K.S.R. Institute with Prof. Nikkam, Vice-Chancellor, Mysore University in Chair. Prof. Hooykaas of SOAS., London, addressing. 21st December 1961"}, {"photo": "6.jpg", "title": "Svami Gangesvarananda doing the Pratistha of Veda Bhagavan at the K.S.R.I. on 5th March 1972"}, {"photo": "7.jpg", "title": "Prof.P.Thieme of Germany delivering the 28th Foundation Day Address of the K.S.R.I. on 16th December 1973"}, {"photo": "8.JPG", "title": "His Holiness Sri Jayendra Sarasvati Sankaracharya of Kanchi Kamakoti Pitha at the K.S.R.
